title: Does the tribunal go down each game
body:
When you get chat banned or banned this season does that ever go down so the next one isn't so serious cause you have changed for awhile or does it stay with you the whole time if so how long or how many games until the punishment is like gone.
Don't know how to explain it but hope people know what i mean lol.

replies.body: this game is the toxic affront to a rationally sound healthy society. and by this game i mean you people

Well, that's a no simply because the tribunal is currently inactive on all servers. If anything, you'd be referring to things like Instant Feedback and Leavebuster. As far as I'm aware you have to be "clean" for quite a long time for punishments to "reset", though I think it does depend on which system is dealing with it, what you did and the severity of what you did.

Hope I understood you properly, did get a little confused.

Your best bet is to just send a support ticket to Riot through the support section (there's a link on the top of every page on the League website, just so you know).

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hFsf3wOI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-10T00:42:45.739+0000)
>
> Well, that's a no simply because the tribunal is currently inactive on all servers. If anything, you'd be referring to things like Instant Feedback and Leavebuster. As far as I'm aware you have to be "clean" for quite a long time for punishments to "reset", though I think it does depend on which system is dealing with it, what you did and the severity of what you did.
> 
> Hope I understood you properly, did get a little confused.
> 
> Your best bet is to just send a support ticket to Riot through the support section (there's a link on the top of every page on the League website, just so you know).

Yeah i wasn't sure what it was called but thanks that helped :)
